product_Description: Laroche-VF facewash for a gentle and effective cleanse.
product_Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Coco-Glucoside, etc.
how_To_Use: Apply on wet face, lather, and rinse thoroughly for a refreshing feel.

product_Description: Cereve CF facewash for hydrating and nourishing the skin.
product_Ingredients: Ceramides, Hyaluronic Acid, Water, Glycerin, etc.
how_To_Use: Wet face, apply the facewash, massage, and rinse off with water.

product_Description: Simple BFC facewash for a clean and clear complexion.
product_Ingredients: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Panthenol, etc.
how_To_Use: Gently apply on wet face, lather, and rinse off for a refreshed look.

product_Description: Lactro facewash with lactose for a gentle and soothing cleanse.
product_Ingredients: Lactose, Water, Glycerin, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, etc.
how_To_Use: Massage on damp face, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly.

product_Description: Unicskin facewash for a unique and revitalizing skincare experience.
product_Ingredients: Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Glycerin, etc.
how_To_Use: Apply on wet face, lather, and rinse off for a fresh and radiant look.

product_Description: Cetaphill facewash for gentle cleansing suitable for all skin types.
product_Ingredients: Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, etc.
how_To_Use: Apply and massage on wet face, rinse off thoroughly for clean and soft skin.
